controller.interfaces

Interface IViewController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewController

    public interface IViewController
    Interface which defines methods concerning commands that manage the type of view to be showed and undo/redo. This interface is necessary to make the implementation of certain commands independent, in this way it is possible to change the implementation of the listed commands (following the characteristics of this interface) without changing completely the class Controller.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createMemento()
      It uses the method IModel.createMemento() and it save it into a specific structure.
      IModel.IMemento getPrevMemento()
      It gives back the previous IModel.IMemento if it exists, namely the state in which the model was before of the last change.
      IModel.IMemento getSuccMemento()
      It gives back the successive IModel.IMemento if it exists, namely the state in which the model was before cancelling the last change.
      void resetCaretaker()
      It resets the structure which keeps all of the states of the model saved before.
      void setModel(IModel m)
      Method necessary to define the model on which all the different operations must be made.
      void setViewType(IView v, java.lang.Object ob)
      Method that allow to load a certain type of view on the IView passed in input depending on the Object considered parameter
      void undoRedo(IView v)
      Method which enable/disable commands undo/redo for the view, if it exist saved previous and/or successive states of model.
      void updateViews(IView v)
      It updates the IView passed as a parameter, choosing the type of view depending on the last setViewType(IView, Object) realized; if that method was never called, you manage it as if obj is null.

    • Method Detail

      • setViewType

        void setViewType(IView v,
                 java.lang.Object ob)
        Method that allow to load a certain type of view on the IView passed in input depending on the Object considered parameter. - if obj is null, it loads a total view of the timetable. - if obj is a String it corresponds to the name of a professor and therefore it loads a view of the timetable depending on the name of the professor. - if obj is a Days it loads a view of the timetable depending on the past day. - if obj is a ISubject it loads a view of the timetable depending on the selected subject. - if obj is a Classrooms it loads a view of the timetable depending on the classroom chosen. - if obj is a SubjectType it loads a view of the timetable depending on the type of subject chosen.
        Parameters:
        v - View on which the type chosen has to be loaded.
        ob - Object which allow to decide the type.

      • setModel

        void setModel(IModel m)
        Method necessary to define the model on which all the different operations must be made.
        Parameters:
        m - Model to work on.

      • getPrevMemento

        IModel.IMemento getPrevMemento()
        It gives back the previous IModel.IMemento if it exists, namely the state in which the model was before of the last change.
        Returns:
        Previous state of model.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the previous model doesn’t exist.

      • getSuccMemento

        IModel.IMemento getSuccMemento()
        It gives back the successive IModel.IMemento if it exists, namely the state in which the model was before cancelling the last change.
        Returns:
        Successive state of the model.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the successive doesn’t exist.

      • createMemento

        void createMemento()
        It uses the method IModel.createMemento() and it save it into a specific structure.

      • resetCaretaker

        void resetCaretaker()
        It resets the structure which keeps all of the states of the model saved before.

      • updateViews

        void updateViews(IView v)
        It updates the IView passed as a parameter, choosing the type of view depending on the last setViewType(IView, Object) realized; if that method was never called, you manage it as if obj is null.
        Parameters:
        v - IView to be updated.

      • undoRedo

        void undoRedo(IView v)
        Method which enable/disable commands undo/redo for the view, if it exist saved previous and/or successive states of model.
        Parameters:
        v - IView where commands undo/redo are enabled/disable. .
